name: Rigserve

screenshots.caption: Rigserve is a network server run from the command line!

short_description: Rigserve implements a human-readable control language for remote or local IP access to amateur radio equipment (rigs). A Python class library allows interfacing with a large number of rig types via serial ports or other methods.
